mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( user_name, user_password, user_email, user_register_date, user_clsf, user_message ) VALUES ( #{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{userEmail}, now(), #{userClsf}, "Nothing there. Please edit your profile to put a message." )
